IV. Interventions
IFA supplementation
/circle6 While talking to the pregnant woman, stress the need for increased intake of iron during 
pregnancy and also if she is anaemic. Th is helps preventing the complications due to 
anaemia. Besides recommending IFA supplementation, counsel the woman to increase 
her dietary intake of iron-rich foods, such as
